NO_ADVENTURE: {{emojis.jolyne}} You haven't started your adventure yet. Use `/adventure start` to start it!
ALREADY_ADVENTURE: {{emojis.jolyne}} You already started your bizarre adventure.
TRADE: {{emojis.jolyne}} You are currently trading. Please complete your trade first before using any adventure command.
BATTLE: :crossed_swords: You are currently in a battle. Please finish your battle first before using any adventure command. Can't find your battle ? Click here: {{link}}
LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE:
:stars: <@{{user.id}}>, You are now level **{{level}}**

:information_source: You gained **4** skill-points. Use `/skill-points` to use them.
BASE_COOLDOWN: You have to wait **{{timer}}** second(s) before using the `/{{command}}` again.
DEAD: You are dead. Regenerate yourself first.
STAND_DISK_LIMIT: {{npc.jolyne}} Oh oh, you've reached your limit. You can only store **{{limit}}** stand discs. You can increase this limit by becoming a [patron](https://patreon.com/mizuki54).
STAND_DISK_LIMIT_PATREON: {{npc.jolyne}} Oh oh, you've reached your limit. You can only store **{{limit}}** stand discs. You can increase this limit by upgrading your [patreon tier](https://https://patreon.com/mizuki54.com/mizuki54)
